title: Sol Yates
text:
I am a Research Associate at Manchester Centre for Health Economics, University of Manchester, having graduated in 2024 with an MSc in Economics.
My interests lie around Econometrics, Health and Health Economics.
In my spare time you can find me contributing to open source projects, or exercising (see below for a combination of the both!).
